N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4210.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A nonrefundable
application fee of $250 must be paid to the corporation before final review of
an application can be completed, except the application fee will be reduced to
$100 for projects involving financing by the corporation of less than $250,000
or less. (b) The corporation shall
assess an administrative fee of up to 1.5 percent of the project loan, payable
by the borrower at or prior to closing. The corporation may allocate the
administrative fee to cover project-related expenses it deems appropriate. Such
allocation may include sharing a portion of the administrative fee with a
municipality, industrial development agency, local development corporation, or
other not-for-profit entity that has assisted the corporation or the borrower
in preparing or processing the application for assistance or in closing the
project. In addition, the borrower generally will be obligated to pay for all
expenses related to the project loan, including but not limited to expenses
related to appraisals, surveys, title insurance and other requirements deemed
appropriate by the corporation. Notes
